Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I am really wanting to make Kerbin look alot better. What visual mods are currently confirmed to work in 1.0.2 to do this? I am not having much luck figuring out how to actually install texture replace properly, the instructions somewhat confuse me as to what is required where. I do have CKAN installed at present however.

Any help appreciated!

Kerbal007 

![L6lx8M9.png](http://i.imgur.com/L6lx8M9.png)

Ye olde [EVE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-0-24-7-4-Sep-9-2014-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements) works ok still, though IIRC the 'city lights' bit doesn't.

As usual, that's a "works for me", it's officially outdated though so YMMV.

If you're feeling adventurous, there's an [overhaul](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100857-WIP-EVE-%28Environmental-Visual-Enhancements%29-Overhaul) in the works, looks very nice.

Thanks Steve ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I'll trust the advice of a fellow kiwi ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT: Yeh thats still pretty experimental ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png) ill hold off for now

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-04T01:18:24Z" title="06/04/2015 01:18  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 4, 2015</time> by Kerbal007**

> 
> Ye olde [EVE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-0-24-7-4-Sep-9-2014-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements) works ok still, though IIRC the 'city lights' bit doesn't.
> As usual, that's a "works for me", it's officially outdated though so YMMV.
> 
> If you're feeling adventurous, there's an [overhaul](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100857-WIP-EVE-%28Environmental-Visual-Enhancements%29-Overhaul) in the works, looks very nice.

EVE with city lights works fine in KSP 1.0.2 for me.

I also really love [Engine Lighting](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121987) and [SmokeScreen](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71630) although those make your rocket flights look better, not Kerbin itself.

If you fly a lot of planes and want more realistic light scattering, [Scatterer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115408) looks amazing. (It doesn't transition well to space yet, and I mainly fly rockets. But the flights I had with it looked incredible in the lower atmosphere!)

All four are on CKAN.

Want to know which mods work and which might not? [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library)

Got a link to this thread from someone's signature on these forums [https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/37nedh/installing_mods_to_make_ksp_look_nicer_step_by/](https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/37nedh/installing_mods_to_make_ksp_look_nicer_step_by/)

It's quite a comprehensive list and instructions to get what I think is the best visual experience you can at the moment, so check it out. 

![TbNFbAq.gif](https://i.imgur.com/TbNFbAq.gif)
Mate that's brill, have some cred!
